document_data.caption: A map showing Breeze's Cut and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Breeze's Cut
document_data.mainbody: '''Breeze's Cut''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Breeze's Cut was located in the northwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It branched west from the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] to end on [[Westwall Street]] after passing several buildings. [[Roguerun Alley]] connected with the southern side of Breeze's Cut.
